price: 42. Baatil fooca-le gambik kaat mayamaataay, derre-le gambik kaat mayamaataay, usuk tu-kaat ossaanaah tu-kaak daggoysaanamak daccarsime kitab kinni, Yallay fayla leeh naggaarah yanih kabuk obsimeemih sabbatah.
arabic: لَّا يَأۡتِيهِ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ يَدَيۡهِ وَلَا مِنۡ خَلۡفِهِۦۖ تَنزِيلٞ مِّنۡ حَكِيمٍ حَمِيدٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: lā yatīhi al-bāṭilu min bayni yadayhi walā min khalfihi tanzīlun min ḥakīmin ḥamīdin
